column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Melissa - Thanks for your review. I appreciate your candor
column2: and would like to suggest one of our "dry noodle" dishes that do not contain broth: Tan Tan Men
column3: Mazemen or Hiyashi Cold Ramen. They have all been featured as monthly specials and
column5: some are not listed on our menu. But we like to recommend these dishes to customers who are not big fans of soup in general. And for that very reason
column6: we thank you for giving us a try and for the kind words regarding the other aspects of our house.
